metadata.name: The sin of beauty
metadata.description:
In the evolution of my essence,
I have torn myself apart,
And you just condemned me,
To be little, To be weak, To be incapable,
To what sin? Beauty?

Hand drew with pencil, etude, pencil powder, graphite, and conte.

physical size: 20x28.4 CM
scanned size: 4446x6282 pixels
